name: The packing crate
description:
A short puzzlescript game about creating and filling pits while packing and unpacking a crate.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=bf085cc3e8be62eea8a9f6d6762e2823

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=bf085cc3e8be62eea8a9f6d6762e2823

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
